content:
Can you provide a table of three political leaders from Russia with their respective positions and terms served? Please use the format below:
| Name | Position | Term |
|------|----------|------|
|      |          |      |
|      |          |      |
|      |          |      |

Certainly! Here's a table of three notable political leaders from Russia, along with their positions and terms served:

| Name               | Position                   | Term                   |
|--------------------|----------------------------|------------------------|
| Vladimir Putin     | President of Russia        | 2000-2008, 2012-present|
| Dmitry Medvedev    | President of Russia        | 2008-2012              |
| Mikhail Gorbachev  | General Secretary of CPSU  | 1985-1991              |

These leaders have played significant roles in Russian politics over the years.
